trans-unit.source: Logic for preparing the module dependencies during Publish operation
trans-unit.target: 在发布操作过程中准备模块依赖项的逻辑

trans-unit.source: Modules listed as part of RequiredModules are considered as dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 作为 RequiredModules 的一部分列出的模块将被视为依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Modules listed as part of NestedModules, whose module base is not under the specified module base, are considered as dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 作为 NestedModules（其模块基准不位于指定的模块基准下）的一部分列出的模块将被视为依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Above dependencies should be available on the same target repository, otherwise publish operation will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 以上依赖项应在同一目标存储库上可用，否则发布操作将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: For example: If 'SnippetPx' is not available on the repository, below error will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果“SnippetPx”在存储库上不可用，将引发以下错误。

trans-unit.source: Some module dependencies can be managed externally, in that case they should be added to the ExternalModuleDependencies entry in the PSData section of the module manifest.
trans-unit.target: 某些模块依赖项可进行外部托管，在这种情况下应该将它们添加到模块清单 PSData 部分中的 ExternalModuleDependencies 条目中。

trans-unit.source: Below part in the above error message
trans-unit.target: 下面是以上错误消息的一部分

trans-unit.source: During the module installation, above prepared dependencies list is used for installing the dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 模块安装过程中，以上已准备好的依赖项列表会用于安装这些依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Please ensure that your module’s dependencies are available under $env:PSModulePath on your system during publish operation.
trans-unit.target: 请确保发布操作过程中，模块的依赖项在系统上的 $env:PSModulePath 下可用。
